import sys
N, K = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
h = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
result = 0
for i in h:
    if i >= K:
        result += 1
print(result)

N, K = map(int, input().split())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] >= K:
        ans += 1

print(ans)


N, K = map(int, input().split())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

print(len([x for x in h if x >= K]))
import sys

N, K = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
h = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

result = 0

for i in h:
    if i >= K:
        result += 1
print(result)
